title: Clock Pulse Generator
description: CLK_PRG generates clock pulses with a programmable period PT. The outï¿¾put pulses are only one PLC cycle.
name: CLK_PRG

input.name: PT
input.description: The time period for which the output pulse should remain HIGH. Default value is set to 10 milliseconds.

output.name: Q
output.description: A boolean output which is HIGH when the output pulse is generated.
